questions.question: 彼は努力家で、どんな困難にも（＿）進んでいく。
questions.hint:
努力家どりょくか (doryokuka) - hard worker
困難こんなん (konnan) - difficulty
進すすむ (susumu) - to go forward

explanation.correct:
Correct! : ひるまず (hirumazu) - without hesitation or fear

  • おどおど (odoodo) - nervously
  • ぐったり (guttari) - exhaustedly
  • ずかずか (zukazuka) - rudely, boldly (walking in)
  • ひるまず (hirumazu) - without hesitation or fear

Sentence meaning: He is a hard worker and keeps moving forward without fear, no matter the difficulty.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: ひるまず (hirumazu) - without hesitation or fear

  • おどおど (odoodo) - nervously
  • ぐったり (guttari) - exhaustedly
  • ずかずか (zukazuka) - rudely, boldly
  • ひるまず (hirumazu) - fearlessly, without flinching

Sentence meaning: He continues forward bravely no matter the hardships.

questions.question: この映画は、前作と比べて（＿）つまらなかった。
questions.hint:
前作ぜんさく (zensaku) - previous work
比くらべて (kurabete) - compared to

explanation.correct:
Correct! : とことん (tokoton) - Thoroughly

  • よっぽど (yoppodo) - much more
  • きっぱり (kippari) - clearly, firmly
  • そっくり (sokkuri) - exactly alike
  • すっきり (sukkiri) - refreshed, clear

Sentence meaning: This movie was much more boring than the previous one.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer:　とことん (tokoton) - Thoroughly

  • きっぱり (kippari) - firmly
  • そっくり (sokkuri) - identical
  • すっきり (sukkiri) - refreshed
  • よっぽど (yoppodo) - much more

Sentence meaning: Compared to the last film, this one was far more boring.

questions.question: 明日は雨が降る（＿）、傘を持って行ったほうがいいよ。
questions.hint:
傘かさ (kasa) - umbrella
持もって行いく (motte iku) - to bring

explanation.correct:
Correct! : そうだから (sou dakara) - because it seems so

  • せいで (sei de) - because of (blaming)
  • くせに (kuseni) - even though (with blame)
  • そうだから (sou dakara) - because it seems so
  • にしては (nishitewa) - considering

Sentence meaning: Since it seems like it will rain tomorrow, you should take an umbrella.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: そうだから (sou dakara) - because it seems so

  • せいで (sei de) - due to
  • くせに (kuseni) - although
  • にしては (nishitewa) - for (someone/something)
  • そうだから (sou dakara) - because (of that)

Sentence meaning: You’d better take an umbrella because it’s likely to rain tomorrow.

questions.question: 彼の話はいつも大げさで、（＿）ですらない。
questions.hint:
大おおげさ (oogesa) - exaggerated
冗談じょうだん (joudan) - joke

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 冗談 (じょうだん, joudan) - joke

  • 真面目まじめ (majime) - serious
  • 冗談じょうだん (joudan) - joke
  • 話題わだい (wadai) - topic
  • 本気ほんき (honki) - seriousness

Sentence meaning: His stories are always so exaggerated, they’re not even jokes.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 冗談 (じょうだん, joudan) - joke

  • 真面目 (majime) - serious
  • 話題 (wadai) - topic
  • 本気 (honki) - earnest
  • 冗談 (joudan) - joke

Sentence meaning: His stories are overly exaggerated and not even funny.
